subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Flyers center Danny Briere’s postseason prowess is well-known, but he still lacks one requirement to be among the N.H.L.’s great clutch players: a Stanley Cup win.
snippet: Flyers center Danny Briere’s postseason prowess is well-known, but he still lacks one requirement to be among the N.H.L.’s great clutch players: a Stanley Cup win.
